body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Emily Snowden Allen in Clark County, Kentucky, on January 11, 1846. Father of Rebecca Allen, Mary C. Allen, Nancy Allen, Sarah Allen, Richard Allen, and William N. Allen. Farmer in Clark County in 1850.
